content.text:
# List of wars involving Mauritania

This is a list of wars involving Mauritania.
{| class="wikitable"
! rowspan="1" style="background:#116633" width="" | Conflict
! rowspan="1" style="background:#116633" width="170px" | Mauritania  and allies

! rowspan="1" style="background:#116633" width="320px" | Results
! rowspan="1" style="background:#116633" width="100px" | President  of Mauritania
|-

| style="background:#efefef" |

| style="background:#efefef" |
